name: IC Project — Poke The Bear Copy System (Natural Polish)
framework: Josh Braun's Poke The Bear + 4T (Trigger → Think → Third-party → Talk)
philosophy: Ask questions that make prospects discover their own pain. Never tell them they have a problem. Use formal Polish (Pan/Pani, Dzień dobry) — these are manufacturing directors, not startup bros.

v3→v4: Switched from 'Cześć' + Ty to 'Dzień dobry' + Pan/Pani/Was (formal Polish for manufacturing directors)
Replaced 'Skąd Pan wie, że...' (passive-aggressive interrogation) with curious peer-level questions
Replaced 'Zauważyłem, że...' (surveillance opener) with natural observation phrasing
AI-generated poke_question from scorer is now the core of Message 1 — each message is company-specific
Fixed social proof to include specific numbers (Wawel 200+ projektów rocznie)
CTA in M1 is now 'Czy u Was wygląda to podobnie?' — seeks response, not a meeting
Avoided vocative case (no 'Panie Tomaszu') by using 'Dzień dobry,' without name — simpler, still formal

polish_copy_rules.formality: Dzień dobry (NOT Cześć). Pan/Pani or u Was when addressing. These are 45-60yr old directors in manufacturing. Cześć is for peers you already know.
never_say: Domyślam się, że... — assumes they have a problem → triggers defensiveness
Skąd Pan wie, że... — interrogation tone, passive-aggressive
Zauważyłem, że... — sounds like surveillance/stalking, classic AI opener
Chciałbym Panu zaproponować... — instant sales pitch detection
Nasz program / nasze narzędzie — in M1, never name the product
Pozwolę sobie... — outdated formal filler, screams mass outreach
do_say: Przeczytałem o... / Widzę, że... — natural observation, not surveillance
Ciekawi mnie, jak... / Jak to u Was wygląda? — curious, peer-level
Czy zdarza się u Was, że... — soft, assumes competence
Jedno narzędzie, czy raczej Excel + spotkania? — binary choice = easy answer
Pozdrawiam — always close messages, it signals human writing
polish_copy_rules.message_length: 60-90 words for M1/M2. M3 can be shorter (30-40 words). Short sentences. 4-5 paragraphs max.
polish_copy_rules.gender: Default to masculine forms (Pan, u Was). For female prospects, swap to Pani. Clay can detect gender from first name (-a ending ≈ female in Polish).

personalization.description: Each M1 has ONE AI-generated poke_question specific to the company. This is the real personalization — not a variable in a template, but a genuinely different question per prospect. The template provides structure (greeting, social proof, CTA); the AI provides content (hook + question).

fields.personalization_hook: From Scorer: 1 sentence fact about the company. E.g. 'budowie nowej hali w Inowrocławiu' or 'eksporcie do 16 krajów'. Used as the trigger in the opening sentence.
fields.poke_question: From Scorer: 1-2 sentence question specific to this company. E.g. 'Przy dwóch zakładach w różnych krajach — macie jedno źródło prawdy o postępach, czy zbieracie z kilku miejsc?' Used as the core of M1.
fields.signal_bucket: From Clay formula: A (event/expansion), B (hiring), D (generic). Determines the opening sentence style.
fields.industry_label: From Clay formula: Polish instrumental case of industry. E.g. 'branży maszynowej'. Used in social proof line.
fields.first_name: From Clay: for M3 fallback only.
fields.fallback_1: From Clay: alternate contact name (genitive case).
fields.fallback_2: From Clay: second alternate contact name (genitive case).

message_1.name: POKE THE BEAR
message_1.goal: Make them think. Get ANY response. Don't pitch. Don't name IC Project.
message_1.structure: Signal opener → AI poke question → Social proof → CTA + Pozdrawiam
message_1.framework_mapping: T1 (Trigger = signal opener) → T2 (Think = poke question) → T3 (Third-party = social proof) → T4 (Talk = CTA)

rules: NEVER use 'Domyślam się', 'Skąd Pan wie', 'Zauważyłem że' — see polish_copy_rules.never_say
NEVER name IC Project in Message 1
ALWAYS include social proof with specific names (Wawel, VOX Meble) + numbers where possible
CTA is always a response-seeking question, NOT a meeting request. Goal = any reply.
poke_question from scorer provides the company-specific core. Template wraps it in structure.
Use 'u Was' (company-level plural) to avoid gender-specific Pan/Pani in templates
One signal per message. Don't stack multiple observations.

Ile czasu w tygodniu Wasz zespół spędza na zbieraniu statusów projektów? Od firm tej wielkości słyszę: za dużo.

IC Project pokazuje budżety, harmonogramy i statusy na żywo — bez ręcznego raportowania. Np. Wawel zarządza tak ponad 200 projektami.

message_3.name: THE GRACEFUL EXIT
message_3.goal: Respect their inbox. Ask for referral. Keep it short.
message_3.structure: Single short message. Polite. Offers fallback names if available.

templates.both_fallbacks: Dzień dobry, nie chcę zapychać skrzynki. Jeśli jestem pod złym adresem — może powinienem napisać do {{fallback_1}} albo {{fallback_2}}? Będę wdzięczny za nakierowanie. Pozdrawiam
templates.one_fallback: Dzień dobry, nie chcę zapychać skrzynki. Jeśli jestem pod złym adresem — może {{fallback_1}} jest lepszą osobą do rozmowy? Będę wdzięczny za podpowiedź. Pozdrawiam
templates.no_fallbacks: Dzień dobry, nie chcę zapychać skrzynki. Jeśli jestem pod złym adresem — kto u Was koordynuje projekty? Będę wdzięczny za nakierowanie. Pozdrawiam

rules: Short. No pitch. No second ask for a meeting.
'Jestem pod złym adresem' is gender-neutral and non-presumptuous

poke_question_style_guide.description: The scorer AI generates poke_question per company. These rules ensure quality. The question is the CORE of Message 1 — it must be perfect.
poke_question_style_guide.tone: Curious peer, not interrogator. Think: a colleague asking over coffee, not an auditor.
poke_question_style_guide.structure: Best format: observation + binary choice. 'Przy X — macie jedno narzędzie, czy zbieracie z kilku źródeł?' The binary choice makes it easy to respond.
good_patterns: Przy [specific fact] — macie jedno źródło prawdy, czy zbieracie z kilku miejsc?
Przy [specific fact] — jak u Was wygląda [process]? Jeden system, czy raczej Excel + spotkania?
Ciekawe, jak przy [specific fact] koordynujecie [activity] — jeden system, czy maile i telefony?
Czy przy [scale/complexity] zdarza się, że informacja o [problem] dochodzi z opóźnieniem?
bad_patterns: Skąd Pan wie, że... — interrogation, passive-aggressive
Jak Pan sprawdza, że... — implies they're failing at their job
Nie martwi Pana, że... — manipulative fear-mongering
poke_question_style_guide.max_length: 2 sentences. Preferably 1 sentence with a binary choice.

signal_routing.description: Routes prospects to template variant based on signal type.
signal_routing.logic: IF signals contain investment/expansion/growth keywords → A. IF signals contain hiring/recruitment keywords → B. ELSE → D.

industry_mapping.description: Maps English Clay Industry field → Polish instrumental case for social proof line.
industry_mapping.clay_formula: (function(){var i=({{@Industry}}||'').toLowerCase();var m={'machinery':'przemysłu maszynowego','construction':'branży budowlanej','food':'branży spożywczej','packaging':'branży opakowaniowej','automotive':'branży motoryzacyjnej','chemical':'przemysłu chemicznego','plastics':'branży tworzyw sztucznych','defense':'branży obronnej','furniture':'branży meblarskiej','metal':'branży metalowej','electric':'branży elektrycznej'};for(var k in m){if(i.includes(k))return m[k]}return 'branży produkcyjnej'})()
